CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: This is the first report on spirobifluorene - based conjugated polymers used for polymer solar cells , demonstrating the great potential of spirobifluorene moiety as an electron - donating unit for the construction of main chain donor - acceptor alternating conjugated polymers for high performance polymer solar cells .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| spirobifluorene-based conjugated polymers |
| spirobifluorene moiety |
| main chain donor-acceptor alternating conjugated polymers |

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| spirobifluorene-based conjugated polymers |
| spirobifluorene moiety |
| main chain donor-acceptor alternating conjugated polymers |

(Note: "This is the first report" and "demonstrating the great potential" do not refer to specific material names and have been removed.)
